summary: an old recipe for destruction, lost in time. the imperials want the edge over the stormcloaks in the civil war and wish to equipt them selves with a blade strong and quick as a dragons swipe and sour! but have they uncovered the secret?
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]OVERVIEW:[/u][/b]
Dragon-Steel was an ancient material that is said to endorse the strength of a dragon, it is written that part of a dragon is forged with in the steel its self and can cut through iron like it were a doey sweetroll.

the Dragon-Steel Forge was said to hold the secrets and the imperials sent one explorer and avid weapons expert to uncover the secrets of the forge. many say the forge will tell you the secret but none know how, many believe only talented smiths can be told but others suspect the forges presence will scratch it unwillingly into memory.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 [color=#ff7700]                                                                                                  [b][u]HOW TO OBTAIN:[/u][/b]
To obtain this blade you must travel to Dragon Steel Forge which will be marked on your map, you must face the mad man with in to claim the blade. lore and detail is heavy in the dungeon so look closely to see what became of the madman.

                                    to craft the blade you must unlock the Ebony smithing perk and at least 2 dragon scales.

                                      its a decent blade with a use for dragon scales while you climb to dragon bone weaponry.
[/color]
